overview: Naughty Professor is a 2012 Malayalam comedy film written by Baburaj and directed by Hari Narayanan. It stars Baburaj and Lakshmi Gopalaswamy in the lead roles along with Innocent, Lena, Tini Tom, Janardhanan, Sandhya and Malavika who form the rest of the star cast.
title: Naughty Professor
